AI Description: r-data-table is an R package that provides an enhanced data manipulation toolbox using the data.table package. It is designed for fast aggregation of large data sets, rolling joins, and dealing with ordered data.
Core Features:
1. Efficient aggregation and manipulation of large datasets
2. Fast and flexible sorting, grouping, and joining operations
3. Optimized for dealing with ordered data
4. Support for in-memory calculations on large datasets
5. Integration with R programming language for data analysis and visualization tasks
General Tags: R Package, Data Manipulation, Data Analysis, Data Visualization
